title: Pixel 3 XL Android 11 - Lock screen media controls are gone. Anyone know a fix?
content:
After updating to Android 11 I am unable to play media from the lock screen... the controls show for a couple of seconds but then disappear, or vanish the moment I try to interact.
I do not have "Hide player when the media session has ended" enabled - I tried enabled and not, no difference.
Now I am not using a premium service/app and I do not want to, I am not going to pay for YouTube Premium just to listen to music on my own phone; the way it worked prior to updating the OS was via a browser (Brave is my case worked well) with "desktop mode" enabled, play the vid/aud, lock the screen the access the media controls... that no longer works.

Any help would be greatly appreciated.
